"""Industry wise classification i.e, plot graphs of multiple companies of similar industry in one graph
Plot the data with respect to covid cases and its impact on the company growth
Beneficiaries: Pharma, Information Technology,Banking, FMCG,
Losers: Auto initially but later revives
bottom losers: hotels,hospitality
cipla,dr_reddy's,
"""
source.8f7ccd85:
import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
source.8b516bfe:
# Pharma Companies
Dr_Reddy_df_20=Dr_Reddy_df.loc[(Dr_Reddy_df['Date']>='2020-03-28')]
Cipla_df_20=Cipla_df.loc[(Cipla_df['Date']>='2020-03-28')]
Sun_pharma_df_20=Sun_pharma_df.loc[(Sun_pharma_df['Date']>='2020-03-28')]

#IT Companies
Hcl_tech_df_20=Hcl_tech_df.loc[(Hcl_tech_df['Date']>='2020-03-28')]
Infosys_df_20=Infosys_df.loc[(Infosys_df['Date']>='2020-03-28')]
Tcs_df_20=Tcs_df.loc[(Tcs_df['Date']>='2020-03-28')]
Wipro_df_20=Wipro_df.loc[(Wipro_df['Date']>='2020-03-28')]
TechMahindra_df_20=TechMahindra_df.loc[(TechMahindra_df['Date']>='2020-03-28')]

#AutoSector
Bajajauto_df_20=Bajajauto_df.loc[(Bajajauto_df['Date']>='2020-03-28')]
Eicher_df_20=Eicher_df.loc[(Eicher_df['Date']>='2020-03-28')]
Hero_motors_df_20=Hero_motors_df.loc[(Hero_motors_df['Date']>='2020-03-28')]
Maruti_df_20=Maruti_df.loc[(Maruti_df['Date']>='2020-03-28')]
MM_df_20=MM_df.loc[(MM_df['Date']>='2020-03-28')]
Tata_motos_df_20=Tata_motos_df.loc[(Tata_motos_df['Date']>='2020-03-28')]

#FMCG Companies
Asianpaints_df_20=Asianpaints_df.loc[(Asianpaints_df['Date']>='2020-03-28')]
Britannia_df_20=Britannia_df.loc[(Britannia_df['Date']>='2020-03-28')]
HUL_df_20=HUL_df.loc[(HUL_df['Date']>='2020-03-28')]
ITC_df_20=ITC_df.loc[(ITC_df['Date']>='2020-03-28')]
Nestle_df_20=Nestle_df.loc[(Nestle_df['Date']>='2020-03-28')]

#Banking and Finance Companies
Axisbank_df_20=Axisbank_df.loc[(Axisbank_df['Date']>='2020-03-28')]
Bajajfinsv_df_20=Bajajfinsv_df.loc[(Bajajfinsv_df['Date']>='2020-03-28')]
Bajaj_finance_df_20=Bajaj_finance_df.loc[(Bajaj_finance_df['Date']>='2020-03-28')]
Hdfc_df_20=Hdfc_df.loc[(Hdfc_df['Date']>='2020-03-28')]
Hdfc_bank_df_20=Hdfc_bank_df.loc[(Hdfc_bank_df['Date']>='2020-03-28')]
Icici_bank_df_20=Icici_bank_df.loc[(Icici_bank_df['Date']>='2020-03-28')]

Kotak_bank_df_20=Kotak_bank_df.loc[(Kotak_bank_df['Date']>='2020-03-28')]

#PSU's Companies
BPCL_df_20=BPCL_df.loc[(BPCL_df['Date']>='2020-03-28')]
CoalIndia_df_20=CoalIndia_df.loc[(CoalIndia_df['Date']>='2020-03-28')]

NTPC_df_20=NTPC_df.loc[(NTPC_df['Date']>='2020-03-28')]

source.5219e875:
sns.set_style("whitegrid")
fig,axes=plt.subplots(2,3,figsize=(40,24))
# Pharma Companies
axes[0,0].plot(Dr_Reddy_df_20.Date,Dr_Reddy_df_20.Close,'g')
axes[0,0].plot(Cipla_df_20.Date,Cipla_df_20.Close,'r')
axes[0,0].plot(Sun_pharma_df_20.Date,Sun_pharma_df_20.Close,'b')
axes[0,0].set_xlabel("Date")
axes[0,0].set_ylabel("Price")
axes[0,0].set_title("PHARMA COMPANIES")
axes[0,0].legend(["Dr.Reddy's","Cipla","Sun Pharma"])

#IT Companies
axes[0,1].plot(Hcl_tech_df_20.Date,Hcl_tech_df_20.Close,'g')
axes[0,1].plot(Infosys_df_20.Date,Infosys_df_20.Close,'r')
axes[0,1].plot(Tcs_df_20.Date,Tcs_df_20.Close,'b')
axes[0,1].plot(Wipro_df_20.Date,Wipro_df_20.Close,'c')
axes[0,1].plot(TechMahindra_df_20.Date,TechMahindra_df_20.Close,'m')
axes[0,1].set_xlabel("Date")
axes[0,1].set_ylabel("Price")
axes[0,1].set_title("IT Companies/Technology")
axes[0,1].legend(["HCL TECH","INFOSYS","TCS","WIPRO","TECH MAHINDRA"])

#AUTO SECTOR COMPANIES
axes[0,2].plot(Bajajauto_df_20.Date,Bajajauto_df_20.Close,'g')
axes[0,2].plot(Eicher_df_20.Date,Eicher_df_20.Close,'r')
axes[0,2].plot(Hero_motors_df_20.Date,Hero_motors_df_20.Close,'b')
axes[0,2].plot(Maruti_df_20.Date,Maruti_df_20.Close,'c')
axes[0,2].plot(MM_df_20.Date,MM_df_20.Close,'m')
axes[0,2].plot(Tata_motos_df_20.Date,Tata_motos_df_20.Close,'y')
axes[0,2].set_xlabel("Date")
axes[0,2].set_ylabel("Price")
axes[0,2].set_title("AUTOMOBILE COMPANIES")
axes[0,2].legend(["BAJAJ AUTO","EICHER","HERO MOTORS","MARUTI","MM","TATA MOTORS"])

#FMCG Companies
axes[1,0].plot(Asianpaints_df_20.Date,Asianpaints_df_20.Close,'g')
axes[1,0].plot(Britannia_df_20.Date,Britannia_df_20.Close,'r')
axes[1,0].plot(HUL_df_20.Date,HUL_df_20.Close,'b')
axes[1,0].plot(ITC_df_20.Date,ITC_df_20.Close,'c')
axes[1,0].plot(Nestle_df_20.Date,Nestle_df_20.Close,'m')
axes[1,0].set_xlabel("Date")
axes[1,0].set_ylabel("Price")
axes[1,0].set_title("FMCG COMPANIES")
axes[1,0].legend(["Asian Paints","Britannia","HUL","ITC","Nestle"])

#Banking and Finance Companies
axes[1,1].plot(Axisbank_df_20.Date,Axisbank_df_20.Close,'g')
axes[1,1].plot(Bajajfinsv_df_20.Date,Bajajfinsv_df_20.Close,'r')
axes[1,1].plot(Bajaj_finance_df_20.Date,Bajaj_finance_df_20.Close,'b')
axes[1,1].plot(Hdfc_df_20.Date,Hdfc_df_20.Close,'c')
axes[1,1].plot(Hdfc_bank_df_20.Date,Hdfc_bank_df_20.Close,'m')
axes[1,1].plot(Icici_bank_df_20.Date,Icici_bank_df_20.Close,'y')
axes[1,1].plot(Indusind_bank_df_20.Date,Indusind_bank_df_20.Close,'k')
axes[1,1].plot(Kotak_bank_df_20.Date,Kotak_bank_df_20.Close,'tab:orange')
axes[1,1].set_xlabel("Date")
axes[1,1].set_ylabel("Price")
axes[1,1].set_title("BANKING AND FINANCE COMPANIES")
axes[1,1].legend(["Axis Bank","Bajaj Finsv","Bajaj Finance","Hdfc","Hdfc Bank","Icici Bank","IndusInd Bank","Kotak Bank"])

#PSU's Companies
axes[1,2].plot(BPCL_df_20.Date,BPCL_df_20.Close,'g')
axes[1,2].plot(CoalIndia_df_20.Date,CoalIndia_df_20.Close,'r')
axes[1,2].plot(GAIL_df_20.Date,GAIL_df_20.Close,'b')
axes[1,2].plot(IOC_df_20.Date,IOC_df_20.Close,'c')
axes[1,2].plot(NTPC_df_20.Date,NTPC_df_20.Close,'m')
axes[1,2].plot(ONGC_df_20.Date,ONGC_df_20.Close,'y')
axes[1,2].plot(Powergrid_df_20.Date,Powergrid_df_20.Close,'tab:orange')
axes[1,2].set_xlabel("Date")
axes[1,2].set_ylabel("Price")
axes[1,2].set_title("PSU's COMPANIES")
axes[1,2].legend(["BPCL","COALINDIA","GAIL","IOC","NTPC","ONGC","POWERGRID"])
